item.title: Group Twitterbot is broken. :-(
item.description: Twitter updated how direct messages are emailed, so my Group Twitterbot code is now broken. I'm hopefully going to be able to work on it this week. I'm planning on fixed this problem and set it up so it's more stand alone, you'll be able to use it anywhere you …
item.dc:creator: mr.rcollins

item.title: Group Twitter bot
item.description: Chris Hamady had the idea that at the eTech Ohio State Technology Conference we should be able to use Twitter to communicate great things that individuals see throughout the conference. It needed to be set up easy enough for people that have not been using Twitter to use. After discussions …
